Contributor: Rockwell, Norman, 1894-1978, artist.; Woman's Liberty Loan Committee of New England, publisher.;
Note: Signed "Norman Rockwell." Date of issue based on date of the Fourth Liberty Loan campaign. Orientation: Vertical. Illustration by courtesy of "the Literary Digest."
Description: Illustration shows a young boy wearing a red, white and blue tie and key chain. He is showing off his many patriotic buttons on his shirt, which indicates he has bought many savings bonds. Text suggests that it's still necessary to buy more Liberty bonds for the Fourth Liberty Loan campaign..
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: [U.S.] : Woman's Liberty Loan Committee of New England,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: And now the fighting fourth
